markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 343 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodlines**
[Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=5), [Imperial](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=9), [Wyrmblessed](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=17)

**Deities**
[Droskar](/Deities.aspx?ID=28), [Droskar](/Deities.aspx?ID=28), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=10), [Jaidz](/Deities.aspx?ID=122), [Kurgess](/Deities.aspx?ID=42), [Ragathiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=126), [Ragathiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=126), [Shax](/Deities.aspx?ID=80), [Shyka](/Deities.aspx?ID=100), [Skode](/Deities.aspx?ID=239), [Szuriel](/Deities.aspx?ID=136), [The Divine Dare](/Deities.aspx?ID=269), [Trudd](/Deities.aspx?ID=91), [Uvuko](/Deities.aspx?ID=228)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains the quickened condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

---
**Heightened (7th)** You can target up to 6 creatures.
name: Haste

<row gap="medium">

<summary>
 Speed up a creature so it can attack or move more often.
</summary>
summary: Speed up a creature so it can attack or move more often.
summary_markdown: Speed up a creature so it can attack or move more often.

It gains the quickened condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions. --- Heightened (7th) You can target up to 6 creatures.
